thread.title: Recycled plastic pavements put Ghana on eco-friendly path

title: Recycled plastic pavements put Ghana on eco-friendly path
text:
Recycled plastic pavements put Ghana on eco-friendly path 7:18pm IST - 01:13 
An entrepreneur in Ghana is recycling used plastics and turning them into paving blocks for sidewalks and roads. Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
An entrepreneur in Ghana is recycling used plastics and turning them into paving blocks for sidewalks and roads. Matthew Stock reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HfX91l
